eu.wauz.wauzcore.items.scrolls

Interface InventoryScroll

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScrollFortune, ScrollGenericRune, ScrollGenericSkillgem, ScrollRegret, ScrollToughness, ScrollWisdom

    public interface InventoryScroll
    A scroll or similar that can be used on items in a player's inventory.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    WauzScrolls

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getScrollName() 
      boolean use(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event, java.lang.String itemName)
      Uses the scroll on the clicked item.

    • Method Detail

      • getScrollName

        java.lang.String getScrollName()
        Returns:
        The name of the scroll.

      • use

        boolean use(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event,
            java.lang.String itemName)
        Uses the scroll on the clicked item.
        Parameters:
        event - The inventory event.
        itemName - The name of the item, the scroll is used on.
        Returns:
        If the usage was successful and the scroll should be consumed.
